name: people.profile.preferences
description: a People Profile object is set to the value of people.preferences.show_profile by default, but its contents can be set to public or private as desired by the owner.

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of People Profile Preference options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite People Profile Preference when found in request body

key_value_pairs.show_bio: show/hide bio in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_cv: show/hide cv in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_job: show/hide job in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_other_identities: show/hide other_identities in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_professional: show/hide professional in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_pronouns: show/hide pronouns in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_social: show/hide social in all interfaces (default: True)
key_value_pairs.show_website: show/hide website in all interfaces (default: True)
